record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3268
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3268 -- (Senate - July 16, 2008)

[Page: S6799]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that S. 3268 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The leader is correct. The clerk will read the title of the bill for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (S. 3268) to amend the Commodity Exchange Act to prevent excessive price speculation with respect to energy commodities, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I object to any further proceedings with respect to the bill.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
